amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in House Report 118-142 to require the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress a report on allied contributions to defense spending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Davidson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
